ISSUE.TITLE: Unable to copy repository. exit status 1
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hi, I wanted to build a repo of a gitlab instance. Somehow drone fails when it tries to copy the repository from a local path path (even though this is a gitlab ssh/https repo). repo: gitlab@192.168<...> -> src: /tmp/drone-503742147/src It fails here: https://github.com/drone/drone/blob/master/shared/build/build.go#L154

COMMIT.MESSAGE: [UI] hide refresh button in readonly mode (#627)
